sentences.en: In the east, the water is mainly oceanic with relatively minor dilution from direct monsoonal rainfall and runoff from small streams.
sentences.cn: 东部水域主要为海水,而直接的季候雨及小溪溢流,把海水稍为冲淡.

sentences.en: Oceanic fisheries are frequently looked to as a source of inexpensive high - quality protein.
sentences.cn: 海洋渔业通常被看作一种廉价而优质的蛋白质来源.

sentences.en: Oceanic islands are sometimes deficient in animals of certain whole classes.
sentences.cn: 海洋岛屿上有时缺少某整纲所有的动物.

sentences.en: Oceanic islands, particularly in the Pacific, form minor provinces.
sentences.cn: 大洋岛尤其是太平洋形成次级区.

sentences.en: Oceanic Society was established in 1969 as a non - profit conservation organization.
sentences.cn: 该学会成立于1969年,是一家从事环境保护的 非盈利 性组织.

sentences.en: The crust can be divided into two types, oceanic and continental.
sentences.cn: 地壳可以被分成两类:海洋性的和大陆性的.

sentences.en: These years, the oceanic and technology has been attached more importance.
sentences.cn: 近些年来, 海洋科技的发展越来越受到人类的重视.
